rules: Rule1: If the drug is patented, then the plant is cultivated.
Rule2: Either the drug is patented or the drug is generic.

Rule3: Under the condition that the tool is in research phase, if it is not the case that the game is regulated or (if the drug is generic then either the game is banned or the game is not approved), then the game is marketed.
Rule4: If the plant has quality control, then the manufacturing is profitable.
Rule5: Whenever the plant has a safety check, the manufacturing is profitable.
Rule6: Provided that the plant is certified, the plant has quality control.
Rule7: The plant is certified or the plant is inspected.
Rule8: If the drug is banned, then the drug is approved.
Rule9: If the tool is licensed, then the plant is registered.
Rule10: Either the tool is licensed or the tool is unlicensed.
Rule11: Whenever the tool is unlicensed, the tool is experimental.
Rule12: Under the condition that the tool is experimental, if the plant is inspected, then the plant has a safety check.
Rule13: Either the tool is tested or the tool is untested.
Rule14: Provided that the tool is untested, it is not the case that the drug is approved.
Rule15: Whenever it is not the case that if the tool is tested, then the drug is not approved, the legislation is compliant.
Rule16: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the tool is tested, then the drug is not approved, it is not the case that the legislation is compliant.
Rule17: Provided that it is not the case that if the manufacturing is not profitable, then the plant is not approved, the drug is banned.
Rule18: If the manufacturing is not profitable, then the plant is approved.
Rule19: Whenever the manufacturing is not profitable, the game is approved.
facts: Fact1: The tool is in research phase.
Fact2: It is not the case that the game is regulated.
Fact3: It is not the case that the game is marketed.
Fact4: The plant is not registered.
Fact5: The game is not banned.
Fact6: It is not the case that the plant is cultivated.
